page.title: 08Great Pinley Farm
page.content: This covers 140 acres of land which are used for wheat and arable crops, no animals are kept at all. In contrast to the other farms we have mentioned, the buildings here are more recent. The house is about one hundred years old and the outbuildings are about one hundred and fifty years old. Some of this land will be changed for ever in the near future because plans have been made to build part of a new motorway across some of the fields. Three small cottages, which are very beautiful, will have to be demolished to make way for this motorway.
